verses.text: He that dasheth in \w pieces|strong="H6327"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* before thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* the \w munition|strong="H4694"\w*, \w watch|strong="H6822"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, make \add thy\add* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, \w fortify|strong="H0553"\w* \add thy\add* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* \w mightily|strong="H3966"\w*.\f + \fr 2.1 \ft He…: or, The disperser, or, hammer\f*

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w* the \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, as the \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for the \w emptiers|strong="H1238"\w* have emptied them \w out|strong="H1238"\w*, and \w marred|strong="H7843"\w* their vine \w branches|strong="H2156"\w*.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft the excellency of Jacob…: or, the pride of Jacob as the pride, etc\f*

The \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* of his mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* is made \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, the \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add are\add* in \w scarlet|strong="H8529"\w*: the \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \add shall be\add* with \w flaming|strong="H0784"\w* \w torches|strong="H6393"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w preparation|strong="H3559"\w*, and the fir \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* shall be terribly \w shaken|strong="H7477"\w*.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft in scarlet: or, dyed scarlet\f*\f + \fr 2.3 \ft flaming: or, fiery\f*

The \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* shall \w rage|strong="H1984"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*, they shall justle one against \w another|strong="H8264"\w* in the broad \w ways|strong="H7339"\w*: they shall \w seem|strong="H4758"\w* like \w torches|strong="H3940"\w*, they shall \w run|strong="H7323"\w* like the \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w*.\f + \fr 2.4 \ft they: Heb. their show\f*

He shall \w recount|strong="H2142"\w* his \w worthies|strong="H0117"\w*: they shall \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* in their \w walk|strong="H1979"\w*; they shall make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* to the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* thereof, and the \w defence|strong="H5526"\w* shall be \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft worthies: or, gallants\f*\f + \fr 2.5 \ft defence: Heb. covering, or, coverer\f*

The \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* shall be \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, and the \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* shall be \w dissolved|strong="H4127"\w*.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft dissolved: or, molten\f*

And \w Huzzab|strong="H5324"\w* shall be led away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w*, she shall be brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and her \w maids|strong="H0519"\w* shall \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* \add her\add* as with the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w doves|strong="H3123"\w*, \w tabering|strong="H8608"\w* upon their \w breasts|strong="H3824"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft Huzzab: or, that which was established, or, there was a stand made\f*\f + \fr 2.7 \ft led…: or, discovered\f*

But \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* \add is\add* of \w old|strong="H3117"\w* like a \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: yet they shall flee \w away|strong="H5127"\w*. \w Stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \add shall they cry;\add* but none shall look \w back|strong="H6437"\w*.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft of old: or, from the days that she hath been\f*\f + \fr 2.8 \ft look back: or, cause them to turn\f*

Take ye the \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, take the \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: for \add there is\add* none \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w store|strong="H8498"\w* \add and\add* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* out of all the \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft for…: or, and their infinite store, etc\f*\f + \fr 2.9 \ft pleasant…: Heb. vessels of desire\f*

She is \w empty|strong="H0950"\w*, and \w void|strong="H4003"\w*, and \w waste|strong="H1110"\w*: and the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w melteth|strong="H4549"\w*, and the \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* smite \w together|strong="H6375"\w*, and much \w pain|strong="H2479"\w* \add is\add* in all \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and the \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* of them all \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w blackness|strong="H6289"\w*.

Where \add is\add* the \w dwelling|strong="H4583"\w* of the \w lions|strong="H0738"\w*, and the \w feedingplace|strong="H4829"\w* of the young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*, where the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, \add even\add* the old \w lion|strong="H3833"\w*, \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, \add and\add* the \w lion’s|strong="H0738"\w* \w whelp|strong="H1482"\w*, and none made \add them\add* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*?

The \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* did tear in \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w* \w enough|strong="H1767"\w* for his \w whelps|strong="H1484"\w*, and \w strangled|strong="H2614"\w* for his \w lionesses|strong="H3833"\w*, and \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* his \w holes|strong="H2356"\w* with \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, and his \w dens|strong="H4585"\w* with \w ravin|strong="H2966"\w*.

Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and I will \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* her \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* in the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, and the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* thy young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*: and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* thy \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of thy \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* shall no more be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.
